com.k2.Wiget.templateFactory

Class TemplateAssembly<W extends Wiget,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.Wiget.WigetAssembly<TemplateFamily,java.io.PrintWriter,W,T>
      • com.k2.Wiget.templateFactory.TemplateAssembly<W,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    W - The type of the root wiget in the assembly
    T - The required type of the root wiget in the assembly

    public class TemplateAssembly<W extends Wiget,T>
extends WigetAssembly<TemplateFamily,java.io.PrintWriter,W,T>
    The template assembly that is used to assemble template wigets The indentation functionality is additional to the functionality required by the raw wiget assembly and are used by all template wigets
    Author:
    simon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TemplateAssembly(TemplateFactory factory, java.lang.Class<W> wigetType)
      Create a template assembly for the given factory and root wiget type, using an indent string of '\t'

      Create a template assembly for the given template factory, root wiget type and indent string
